content: thank you so much for downloading my pattern and for supporting a small business find me on instagram @houseofbuddleia please feel free to use the hashtags #hobfreedomcollection and #hobfreedomhat so that i can see all your wonderful finished projects all images and text are copyright of house of buddleia by anna stephenson this pattern is for personal use only and must not be used or redistributed for commercial gain for any help or queries please contact me at houseofbuddleia@googlemail com the freedom collection - hat | house of buddleia 6
